powers.description: The namespace and IDs of the powers this origin should have.
powers.markdownDescription: The namespace and IDs of the powers this origin should have.

icon.description: The item stack which is displayed as the icon for the origin in the top-left corner of the choose/view origin screen.
icon.markdownDescription: The item stack which is displayed as the icon for the origin in the top-left corner of the choose/view origin screen.

unchoosable.description: If set to true, this origin will not show up in any origin layer to choose it, but it will still be able to be set for that layer with a command or via an origin upgrade.
unchoosable.markdownDescription: If set to true, this origin will not show up in any origin layer to choose it, but it will still be able to be set for that layer with a command or via an origin upgrade.

order.description: Specifies the position of this origin in the choose origin screen among the other origins with the same impact in the layer. If not specified, will be a really large number - basically adding it in the end.
order.markdownDescription: Specifies the position of this origin in the choose origin screen among the other origins with the same impact in the layer. If not specified, will be a really large number - basically adding it in the end.

impact.description: Specifies the impact of this origin with a number from 0 (none) to 3 (high).
impact.markdownDescription: Specifies the impact of this origin with a number from 0 (none) to 3 (high).

name.description: The display name of the origin.
name.markdownDescription: The display name of the origin.

upgrades.description: A list of upgrades for this origin, specifying which advancements turn this origin into which other origin.
upgrades.markdownDescription: A list of upgrades for this origin, specifying which advancements turn this origin into which other origin.

loading_priority.description: Specifies when this origin is loaded. Higher numbers mean it's loaded later, which means it will override those with lower loading priorities which share the same ID.
loading_priority.markdownDescription: Specifies when this origin is loaded. Higher numbers mean it's loaded later, which means it will override those with lower loading priorities which share the same ID.
